sentences.english: One in 3 domestic passengers chooses China Southern Airlines on average.
sentences.chinese: 中國平均每3個民航旅客就有1個選擇南航。

sentences.english: Some analysts have suggested recently that a Delta-Northwest combination may be possible.
sentences.chinese: 近期有分析家預測，達美航空可能與西南航空合併。

sentences.english: Southwest spokeswoman said the airline intends to apologize to the local woman.
sentences.chinese: 西南航空公司發言人稱將向這名女乘客道歉。

sentences.english: China Southern has not announced any change to the amount it will receive .
sentences.chinese: 中國南航尚未宣佈它將得到的注資金額會有任何變動。

sentences.english: CZ should do that following the appropriate regulations of the CSN in Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 應該按照南航在北京的相關規定處理。

sentences.english: Southwest Airlines performs particularly well in the cost and fees and reservation measures.
sentences.chinese: 西南航空在收費與票價和預訂兩方面表現優異。

sentences.english: The Southwest Airlines was able to see the silver lines in the cloud and profit from the oil crisis.
sentences.chinese: 西南航空公司看準油價行情，變成危機中的贏家。

sentences.english: China Southern Airlines will become the first Boeing 787 operators.
sentences.chinese: 南航將成爲國內首家波音787運營商。

sentences.english: Chia Lung Changchun China Southern VIP international airport has opened a dedicated security channel.
sentences.chinese: 長春龍嘉國際機場開通南航貴賓專用安檢通道。

sentences.english: And to China Southern Airlines (CSA) which is among the three giant companies there are opportunities and challenges now.
sentences.chinese: 對於三大航空集團之一的南航來說，機遇和挑戰並存。

sentences.english: China a Southern Airlines and China Eastern Airlines offer similar compensation packages.
sentences.chinese: 南航和東航也提供了類似的補償計劃。

definition: Air China (abbr. for 中國國際航空公司|中国国际航空公司[Zhong1 guo2 Guo2 ji4 Hang2 kong1 Gong1 si1])

pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 Dong1 fang1 Hang2 kong1
